posts.post_content:
[url]https://thecard.store/cards/instant-h804-collection-600-massive-lot-of-19th-c-tradecards/[/url]

Here are the images.  Though all will authenticate, I would probably only grade about 4 of them personally.  Some trimming throughout, but you almost never find this many H804 sets (or set partials) in the same place.  $600 OBO


[IMG]https://thecard.store/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/Screen-Shot-2018-01-13-at-6.22.19-PM-300x300.png[/IMG]
